mapper.select: select i.*, (select count(*) from inquire_answer a where a.inq_no = i.inq_no) answer_status, (select category_name from category_list c where c.category_id = i.category_id) category_name from inquire i where inq_writer = #{userId} order by i.inq_date desc
select res.*, CASE WHEN res_checkout < sysdate THEN 'OK' ELSE 'NO' END AS review from reservation res where user_id = #{userId} order by res_date desc

select answer_status, count(*) status_cnt from( select i.*, (select count(*) from inquire_answer a where a.inq_no = i.inq_no) answer_status from inquire i where inq_writer = #{userId} ) group by answer_status
select answer_status, count(*) status_cnt from( select t.*, trade_success answer_status from trade t where user_id =#{userId} ) group by answer_status
select * from reservation where user_id = #{userId} and res_checkin > sysdate order by res_date desc

select c.coupon_name, u.coupon_code, c.coupon_discount, c.coupon_startday, c.coupon_endday, decode(u.coupon_usedate,null,'Y','N') as coupon_usedate from user_coupon u left join coupon c on u.coupon_code = c.coupon_code where user_id = #{userId}
